site_name: DARBY ACRES FARM L L C

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 11-APR-
23. USDA arrived at the facility but there was no one there. USDA called the number provided in the account and was
able to make contact with the licensee who she was not in town and there was no one available to accompany USDA on
inspection at this time.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 11-APR-
23.  USDA arrived at the facility but there was no one there.   USDA called the number provided in the account and was 
able to make contact with the licensee who she was not in town and there was no one available to accompany USDA on 
inspection at this time. 
 
 
 
End Section
